cu.explanation_en: Setting remote SCTP control port to 0 (invalid port) will cause F1 interface connection failure and setup rejection.

du.explanation_en: Setting remote N control port to 0 (invalid port) will cause F1 interface connection failure and setup rejection.
du.explanation_zh: 將遠端 N 控制端口設定為 0（無效端口）將導致 F1 介面連線失敗和設定拒絕。
